group_1.textLeft: H-Hagumun...!
Where do I take these giant props...?

group_1.textRight: Erm...@I think you can take them to the gym, but...
Ahh, huh?!
Where did I put the costume that I just finished@sewing...?

group_1.textLeft: You lost it...?

group_1.textRight: Awawa... What do I do...?!

group_1.textLeft: Azumiii! Can you hurry up a bit?
At this rate, we'll never be able to rehearse for@the show!

group_1.textRight: I-I'm sorry...!

group_1.textLeft: The preparations don't seem to be finished, do@they...
...We'll have to contact Princess...to tell her we@can't play today, after all.

group_1.textRight: Sorry... It's my fault for being so slow...
Even though senpai and them had told us we@could leave,
if we were able to finish the prep fast...

group_1.narration: sorry princess, we cant go today after all...
please don't worry about us, and just have fun@hanging out with everyone else ^_^

group_1.textLeft: Shigurin and Hagurin said they can't come today.

group_1.textRight: Oh, dear...
Well, they did say yesterday that it might be tough@to make it.
Well then, well then, how about we just hang out@by ourselves today?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, we're puttin' it off till tomorrow!

group_1.textRight: Whaaat?!@You don't say, you don't say...!
We're putting it off... But San-sama and I worked@so hard to free up today's schedule!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry for that, Miyurin, Instructor.
Sorries to Sasha too, for rushing you to clean up.

group_1.textRight: Not at all, this was a good opportunity for me@to find time for it.
I mean, Sasha, it was you and Her Highness who@promised to hang out at your place.
Surely it wouldn't matter even if not all of us can@make it?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... Uhh, I mean, that's what we agreed on@when we made the promise.

group_1.narration: ―Himena―@When cute lil' me was about to despair 'cause people around me@refused to acknowledge Hiko-kun's existence within me,
―Himena―@and my relationship with him,@it was Sasha's voice who reached my ears, y'know.
―Himena―@She was like, we're gonna create a world where we can@love freely, and the two of us totally hit it off.
―Himena―@And that's when we promised to watch@tons of romance dramas together!★

group_1.textRight: In that case, wouldn't it be okay even if Miyu@and the rest weren't there...?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, it's not just Sasha anymore.
Miyurin, Instructor, and everybody else are ALL@my buddies now, 'kay?
So like, if we're gonna have fun, it's best if all of@us are together.

group_1.textRight: I'm not really interested in romance dramas.

group_1.textLeft: Waaah...

group_1.textRight: ...I will watch the dramas. I'm sure everyone's@reactions will be entertaining to see.
Miyu, let's see if we can find a way to squeeze@that into our schedule for tomorrow.

group_1.textLeft: Right, right! I'm starting to look forward to it, too!

group_1.textRight: Now then, to strike while the iron's hot...
I'm going to call the Chairman, so do excuse me@for a moment.
When I first introduced you to Neo-Magius,@Hime-chan,
I wasn't expecting that there would be such an@increase in members.

group_1.textLeft: With this cutie and Hiko-kun, this is like, seriously@easy-peasy!★
...That's what I'd wanna say, but honestly?@It's all totally thanks to you, Sasha!

group_1.textRight: To me...?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, if your voice hadn't reached me back then,
I would've died to despair, and Neo-Magius@would've disappeared, you know!
So c'mon, Sasha!
From now on, continue to support this cutie and@everyone as a member of our organization, okay?!
...[wait:0.8][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]Sasha?

group_1.textRight: Oh, no! I'm very glad to hear that.

group_1.textLeft: Princess, Sasha.
Sorry to bother you, but could you come give us@a hand?
If the Youth Association tasks can be finished@by the end of today,
that might free up some time in our schedule@for tomorrow.

group_1.textCenter: Sure, okie-dokie! I'll help you with anything!
(Sasha, you were acting a teensy bit weird.@I wonder why...?)
